ChristmasWreath.ChristmasWreath.rotatePi: Rotate a pixel pattern among the LED strip.
ChristmasWreath.ChristmasWreath.setLevel:
Set specfic level to different color
(0 = level-1, 1 = level-2, etc...)

Set christmas wreath brightness
Set specfic level to different color and brightness
(0 = level-1, 1 = level-2, etc...)
ChristmasWreath.ChristmasWreath.setMicTh: Set microphone threshold to trigger bubble animation.
range from 0 to 255, for quiet area about 50, eg: 50,100,128
ChristmasWreath.ChristmasWreath.setPixel:
Set pixel color
(0 = index-1, 1 = index-2, etc...)
ChristmasWreath.ChristmasWreath.setRingC:
Set christmas wreath brightness
value larger than 50 color will change to white
ChristmasWreath.ChristmasWreath.showStri: Show strip led color. Any change in memory needed call this function to display on LED strip.
ChristmasWreath.create: Create a new Christmas Wreath controller.
ChristmasWreath.levels: Gets the level value of a known levels
ChristmasWreath.rgbColor: Gets red, green, blue channels into a RGB color
ChristmasWreath.rgbColor|param|blue: value of the blue channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
ChristmasWreath.rgbColor|param|green: value of the green channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
ChristmasWreath.rgbColor|param|red: value of the red channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
